title.rendered: DeepDrill Solutions welcomes Aberdeen Sales Manager

content.rendered:
DeepDrill Solutions is pleased to welcome John Poulsen to our team as Sales Manager for Aberdeen.

John has for many years successfully developed international sales and operational management strategies and consultancy services with global manufacturing, production technology and service companies.

John also brings to DeepDrill Solutions his years of direct experience with complex high pressure and chemical dosing equipment & applications. Based at our Ellon Sales & Service facility, John is developing a full local service for our Aberdeen customers and is further enhancing our long-term supply relationships for Standard Products and Engineered Systems.

John can be contacted directly at johnpoulsen@deepdrillsolutions.com or on +44 (0) 7990 591700
